attributes.action: undertake, in view of the spiralling uncontrolled costs of the 2012 Olympic Games in the climate of soaring national and local taxation and the devastating effect on grass roots sport, to tell the Olympic Committee that we can not afford them and to withdraw our offer to host them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every day we read of more and more   services etc. being withdrawn because of the cancellation of finance by the Government.  Yet we are constantly having new taxes (eg "the green tax") being imposed upon us to pay for the Government's wasteful policies.  Local taxation rises every year but services are being cut.  We simply can not afford to pay the colossal sums needed to fuel the Brown/Blair egos and pay for the Games.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
